Tests that non-standard appearance value slider-vertical trigger a deprecation issue.
Issue for appearance "slider-vertical": {
    issue : {
        code : DeprecationIssue
        details : {
            deprecationIssueDetails : {
                affectedFrame : {
                    frameId : <string>
                }
                sourceCodeLocation : {
                    columnNumber : 14
                    lineNumber : 6
                    scriptId : <string>
                    url : http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/css-appearance-non-standard.html?appearance&slider-vertical
                }
                type : CSSValueAppearanceSliderVertical
            }
        }
    }
}
Issue for -webkit-appearance "slider-vertical": {
    issue : {
        code : DeprecationIssue
        details : {
            deprecationIssueDetails : {
                affectedFrame : {
                    frameId : <string>
                }
                sourceCodeLocation : {
                    columnNumber : 14
                    lineNumber : 6
                    scriptId : <string>
                    url : http://127.0.0.1:8000/inspector-protocol/resources/css-appearance-non-standard.html?-webkit-appearance&slider-vertical
                }
                type : CSSValueAppearanceSliderVertical
            }
        }
    }
}
appearance value "auto" did not generate issue.
-webkit-appearance value "auto" did not generate issue.
